12.eng-name: The Book of The At-Tatbiq (Clasping One's Hands Together)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Alqamah and Al-Aswad said:"We prayed with Abdullah bin Mas'ud in his house. He stood between us and we placed our hands on our knees, but he took them off and made us interlace our fingers, and said: "I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) do that
